name: Astral Ward Research
description: Tomes and scrolls from every iteration of Tyria—the library of Amnytas is Isgarren's best kept secret.
requirement: Read all the books in the Bastion of Knowledge library.

bits.text: "An Unofficial History of the Wizard's Court, Volume 2" by A. Hawthorn

"On the Introduction of Sylvari to the Astral Ward"
